name: Add HTML to Page
author: Dinesh Panchal

sections.description:
If you need support to get this plugin installed or have a Custom version of the plugin please email us on info@itchimes.com.

Add .html to the URL of PAGES only.

Feature

  • Add .html to the URL of PAGES only.
  • Should re-activate after changing Permalink (Recommanded).

You can visit our website itchimes.com

Wating for your valuable feedback/comments.
sections.installation:
1. Download the latest zip file and extract the ‘add-html-to-pages’ directory.
  2. Upload it to your ‘/wp-content/plugins/’ directory.
  3. Activate ‘Nofollow External Link’ on the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  4. That’s it, you are all done ðŸ™‚
